title: DER VERLORENE aka THE LOST ONE - Peter Lorre
description:
DER VERLORENE aka THE LOST ONE
directed by Peter Lorre / Germany 1951
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0044188/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0044188/</a>

The film opens in a displaced persons (refugees and released prisoners) camp in Germany after the WW11 armistice. Peter Lorre is Dr. Karl Neumeister a world-weary, strangely acting, chain-smoking, hard-drinking and hard-working physician in the camp. The loner doctor is confronted with his sordid past when a refugee by the name of Nowak (Karl John) shows up posing as a chemist and is assigned by the barrack&#039;s head to assist the doctor in giving inoculations. The film goes into flashback when the doctor and his mysterious new assistant go into the canteen to get stinking drunk and talk about their coincidental meeting.




Screens are from a different rip of slightly inferior quality.

------my rip----

I cleaned up the English subs somewhat but they could use more work if anyone is up to the job. They&#039;re adequate to enjoy the film though as is, just not as good as they could be.
